column2: geom_raster(data = differences, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = difference)) +
labs(title ="GLM - Change in Probability of Hooded Warbler Presence (Future - Current)") +
ggsave(SDM_differences, filename = here("Lab6_SDMs_correlative", "maps", "warbler_SDM_differences.png"), dpi = 150, units = c('in'), width = 10, height = 6)
